content:
willhausman commented on issue #995:

@alexcrichton is this answer still true? I had opened https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime-dotnet/issues/82 this morning, but further investigation revealed it was not an issue specific to the dotnet build as I can reproduce the same behavior with python.

bjorn3 commented on issue #995:

That is probably the same kind of error. However it is something that needs to be separately fixed for both. For example by adding a new build for musl based systems.

alexcrichton commented on issue #995:

Yes the wasmtime-py extension and the Wasmtime repository do not have precompiled artifacts for musl, only for glibc.
